column4: hi, im trying to get intel 4965 wireless to work. I can see its installed but its not coming up in nwm
Gutsy kernel is patched with iwlwifi which is the latest driver for the 4965, works fine on my thinkpad
thanks, I upgraded to 2.6.24 whcih includes it
i was having problems with sound and wireless connection even though wireless showed there so i used the latest ubuntu dev kernel
